question: Use of CO4 Hybrid Napier grass has been found to enhance the milk production, quality, good reproductive health and overall physical condition of Indian milch cattle. The Grass is most commonly found in _?
explanation: Hybrid Napier CO4 grass is one of the widely cultivated fodder grasses because of its high Nutritive value. Napier grass is also called as Elephant Grass due to its tallness and vigorous vegetative growth. It is mostly found in South India, especially in Tamil Nadu. The characteristic features of CO-4 fodder grass are: profuse tillering, high yield potential, high dry matter and crude protein content, quick regeneration capacity, high leaf to stem ratio, high palatability, free from pest and diseases and low in adverse factors.
